item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: IRC is like...totally the same with better FPS. Truths.
item.content:encoded: IRC is like…totally the same with better FPS. Truths.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: I tried out Second Life, but I just couldn't get into it. I guess it was a bit... <em>too</em> open-ended and structureless. Not to mention I hate the idea of buying game content, such that the more you spend, the better you tend to do in-game (never could go for collectible card games for the same reason).
item.content:encoded: I tried out Second Life, but I just couldn’t get into it. I guess it was a bit… too open-ended and structureless. Not to mention I hate the idea of buying game content, such that the more you spend, the better you tend to do in-game (never could go for collectible card games for the same reason).
